Interface: Server

akkaserverless. Server

An Akka Serverless server.

Methods

shutdown()

Shutdown the server

start( [options])

Start the server.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
options module:akkaserverless.Server~startOptions <optional>

The options for starting the server.
Returns:

The port number that the server bound to.

Type
number

Type Definitions

startOptions

Options for starting a server.

Properties:
Name Type Argument Default Description
bindAddress string <optional>
 "0.0.0.0"

The address to bind to.
bindPort number <optional>
 8080

The port to bind to, specify zero for a random ephemeral port.
